channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned armchair, 2nd August
item.description:
I'm writing to report yet another instance of fly-tipping in our area — this time involving an abandoned armchair. Despite the recent installation of CCTV, incidents like this continue to occur on a near-weekly basis.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Middleton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 2nd August
item.description:
Park view road and clifton road one of the resident from the parkview road keep fly tipping their rubbish middle of the night to the different locations

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Clifton Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 old windows plus other items flytip, 2nd August
item.description:
Been at this location resting up against fence as in photo, on solway road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Solway Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin constantly full and making surrounding road a mess, 2nd August
item.description:
This bin is too small and constantly full as it’s not emptied regularly enough. Surrounding road covered in rubbish as a result and especially at bus stop. A bigger bin is needed and more regular emptying.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 216, Tower Bridge Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I large blue bag next to bin 1 small inside, 2nd August
item.description:
This bag is extremely heavy otherwise I’d have put it in the bin with the other. It’s very “wet” inside too. Haven’t opened to see what is in it but the smaller one (also heavy) that has been dumped in my bin looks like a lot of cut up aubergines.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dawson Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish damping, 2nd August
item.description:
Heavey metal trolley on the spot light that located outside of CooP store at Hopkins street. The daily misusing loading on the spot light causes are cracks on the ground foundation which is a danger to the street and public safety.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Berwick Street, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rotting meat left in household waste bin, 2nd August
item.description:
Meat from butcher left in household waste bin

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oldhill Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds and vegetation growing between the pavement, 2nd August
item.description:
From the electricity sub station up to the side of the Candy Box convenience store there are lots of large weeds growing in between the paving slabs. Please can you get the appropriate department to get this area cleared of the weeds and vegetation at the location. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Maple Crescent, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Heavily overgrown tree on footpath and now affecting A2, 2nd August
item.description:
Overgrown trees on footpath that are now falling onto A2.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 123, Riefield Road, Avery Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped hard cement bag and baby buggy, 2nd August
item.description:
A dumped bag of hard concrete and baby buggy left at the usual flytipping hot spot by the electricity sub station Maple Crescent. Noticed on our regular litter pick today. Please can you arrange for removal.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Maple Crescent, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Myers Lane, New Cross Gate, London

item.title: Here for weeks -, 2nd August
item.description:
Outside the entrance to the school with front bumped damaged and gone. Been here for weeks already and nothing has changed - please remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St. Margaret's Grove, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 72 kilburn high street, 2nd August
item.description:
Because of a loose paving slab (as indicated on the photos), my mother lost her footing and fell causing a broken wrist and other bruising. I noted there were several uneven and loose slab along that section of the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Kilburn High Road, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red card dumped and wrecked- no plates, 2nd August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St. Margaret's Grove, Plumstead, London
